name: Project Timeswall
description:
[About]

You walk-wander, collect memorabilia (rings), bring them to the altar, find a portal, restart the level and over and over again (sorry I didn't have time to do something normal)

[controls]

WASD - to walk

Left mouse click to attack (you attack in the direction where it is located)

{Hotfix}

fixed bug with healthbar (sometimes it showed the value of 1.999999)

fixed bug with Timeswallbar (after the time expired, the game did not restart)

added pictures showing controls
